TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GetManifestCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event of .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use GetManifestCompletedEventArgs to obtain information about a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application after the deployment and application manifests have been downloaded.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client machine.
[!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/InPlaceHostingManagerProjectVB/Form1.vb#1)] [!code-cs[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/InPlaceHostingManagerProject/Form1.cs#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets the context for the current [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Docs.value: An object representing the context for the current application.
Docs.returns: An object representing the context for the current application.

Docs.summary: Gets a description of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest for this deployment.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use this variable to grab any information you need from the application manifest, such as a list of dependencies, trust information, and so on. For more information on the structure of this document, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](../Topic/ClickOnce%20Application%20Manifest.md).
## Examples The following code example shows how to examine an application manifest from within a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event handler to determine whether the application requires full trust by default.
[!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/InPlaceHostingManagerProjectVB/Form1.vb#5)] [!code-cs[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/InPlaceHostingManagerProject/Form1.cs#5)]

Docs.summary: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment manifest for this deployment.
Gets a value indicating whether this [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is cached.
Docs.value: if the application is cached; otherwise, .
Docs.returns: if the application is cached; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> containing the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> containing the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> representing the product name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, as stored in the assembly metadata of the application's main executable file.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> representing the product name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, as stored in the assembly metadata of the application's main executable file.

Docs.summary: Gets a string identifying the subscription.
Docs.value: A string with information identifying the subscription.
Docs.returns: A string with information identifying the subscription.

Docs.summary: Gets the location of a Web page users can visit to obtain product support for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Uri> containing the value found in the `supportUrl` attribute of the deployment manifest's `

Docs.summary: Gets the version of the update for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](../../add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Version> representing the version number contained within the downloaded manifest.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Version> representing the version number contained within the downloaded manifest.
